function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);

var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);

var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,

);

Price: $38.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:39:25 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Packing list:

1* Kids Phone

1* 8G SD Card

1*Lanyard

1*User Manual

Advantage :
1. 180 flip camera
2. Easy to use and carry
3. With 11 funny frames
4. Come with 8GB SD card

Prysyedawn Kids Phone

In order to stimulate children’s desire for exploration and interest in photography, we upgraded the Prysyedawn phone with a new high-definition 180 flip camera configuration. Combining kids phone & MP3 music player to design a role-playing cell phone for toddlers. Small size, easy to carry. suitable for outdoor travel use, allow kids to explore their creativity and curiosity. Your child will have their first own fake phone, you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone.

Specifications :
Display Screen: 2 inch
Battery Capacity: 600mAh
Charging Time: 2-3 Hours
Charging Cable: USB Type-C cable
Support 3.5mm Headphone Jack
System Languages: 20 languages are supported. e.g. English, Spanish, French, Italian, Russian, German, Portuguese, etc.

Cute Stickers and Frames

This toddler phone can be flipped 180 to take cute photos. The sticker camera with 11 cute stickers can choose. Let your little girls get creative by taking photos and the lifetime more interesting.

Wallpapers & Desktop

10 wallpapers, 5 styles of desktop to choose from. Let your child experience the joy of different wallpapers.

Alarm Clock

This phone can teach kids to follow a schedule and develop autonomy by setting alarms to do homework, brush teeth, or go to bed. (only set 4 alarms)

Flashlight

Let the child from being scared when they are in the dark. (Be careful when using the flashlight, Don’t point the light directly at people or animals, as it may cause eye damage.)

4 Funny Puzzle Games

4 Interesting learning games that can develop childrens intelligence and exercise their ability to react and think.

Perfect Gift for Kids Ages 3-6

Kids like taking selfies, videos, large Storage to meet the needs of kids. This Phone toy can store thousands of photos, and kids can recall everything he has recorded! At the same time, you can download music that your child likes to listen to, which helps to develop language and reasoning skills, as well as enhance your child’s memory and creativity. The perfect gift for boys and girls ages 3 4 5 6.

Notice:

1. Do not disassemble the battery.

2. Use the USB cable to connect to the computer. The phone will display charging and the computer will read the disk. You can download photos or music.

3. For adding new music, please confirm the downloaded music is in MP3 format.

4. Our fake phone has no call capabilities, so you dont need to buy a SIM card for this.

Upgraded Toddler Cell PhoneCombining kids phone & MP3 music player to design a role-playing cell phone for toddlers. Equipped with auto Focus, 8.0 Mega pixels and 1080P Video. Greatly improved the definition of photos. With Big head sticker shooting, children can take photos with frames, leave some hilarious photos with family or friends. And it has a high-quality speaker that can support a 3.5mm headphone jack. It is good for children to learn and listen to music.
180 Flip CameraUpgraded to flip-camera configuration, Easy to take selfies. Just open the switch key to enjoy the fun of taking photos. With 10 wallpapers and 5 desktops, kids can switch between their favorite wallpapers. Kids music player Includes a portable lanyard hang, easy to carry and move. Includes a video recorder, Alarm clock, game, and voice recorder for more creative ways to play.
Powerful Battery LifeContinuously taking photos or listening to music for 1-2 hours after fully charged! Come with 1*USB Type-C cable & 1*8GB micro SD card to store thousands of photos!
Safe & Durable ShockproofThis toddler music player is used high quality non-toxic soft plastic, more safe and comfortable for childrens skin. The shockproof shell provides effective anti-fall protection.
Great Gift for KidsPerfect birthday, Christmas, festival, and holiday gifts for boys and girls aged 3~6. Children love taking photo with extremely cute cell phone. Simply capture scene or animals on nature with family, experience the fun from nature. In addition, your child will have their first own fake phone, and you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone again.






Packing list:

1* Kids Phone

1* 8G SD Card

1*Lanyard

1*User Manual

  • Advantage :
  • 1. 180 flip camera
  • 2. Easy to use and carry
  • 3. With 11 funny frames
  • 4. Come with 8GB SD card

Multi-function Electronic Digital Sport Stopwatch Timer, Large Display with Date Time and Alarm Function,suitable for Sports Coaches Fitness Coaches and Referees

100% Brand New and High Quality.

The big & bold LED display gives you more than just the time at a glance instantly know the weather, humidity and temperature outside from across the room
This smart alarm clock is your nightstand companion, with an auto-dim display for a peaceful night that still lets you see the time when you need to; tap on top to dismiss an alarm or snooze
We put privacy first there’s no camera on this smart clock, plus you can turn on the mute switch to disconnect the microphones
The smart speaker lets you stream songs from Amazon Music and others, or listen to audiobooks and podcasts; you can continuously listen around the house by creating speaker groups

From the brand

For years, we have a love affair with multifunctional desk lamp. Our passion led us to design and produce the best desk lamp because you deserve the best. Our product provides consistent excellence quality and do it effortlessly. And we strive to provide all our customers from around the world with sincere service. It is our greatest honor to make you satisfied.

More than just lamp

LCD FUNCTION: You can press “On/Off button” for 3 seconds to turn on/off the LCD screen light. Includes a digital clock for time, date and temperature display. Set an alarm or time for your desk light. Remove clutter from your office desk!
EYE CARE TECH: Bright and eco-friendly LED lighting with an anti-glare shade. 5 levels of adjustable brightness for clear reading and studying without eye strain.
THREE MODULES: 3 colors temperature available(Warm White/ Natural White/ Cold White) for work(office), reading(studying), relaxation(bedroom) and more.
FOLDABLE DESIGN: LED desk lamp with 180 degree flexible arm and 90 degree base axis. The foldable design saves space and you can carry it anywhere in the office, living room, bedroom, dormitory and any other places.

Read more

Read more

Sleep Mode (Can turn off the blue light)

Intimate design, Long press the power button for 3 seconds to turn on / off the LCD display blue light, so you won’t be disturbed when you sleep at night.

Wireless charging & USB Charging Port

Suitable for Mobile phones with QI Wireless Charging Function.

Charge your mobile devices and keep them with reach.

A Light for All Occasions

From work to study, from reading to rest, this desk lamp provides all the lighting you need.

Read more

Eye-Caring Table Lamp

No flicker, less blue light and no glare lighting can protect your eyes from fatigue and vision

loss during reading drawing, working, etc.

Touch Control & Phone Holder

Light touch dimming, the light color temperature and brightness intensity can be adjusted freely.

Hiding smartphone holder, convenient for prop it up for viewing.

Perfect Gift Box

Perfect for anyone: A gift that everyone would love. Beautifully packaged and gift-ready for any occasion such as birthdays to special holidays.

(as of Nov 29,2022 09:19:12 UTC – Details)

From the brand

For years, we have a love affair with multifunctional desk lamp. Our passion led us to design and produce the best desk lamp because you deserve the best. Our product provides consistent excellence quality and do it effortlessly. And we strive to provide all our customers from around the world with sincere service. It is our greatest honor to make you satisfied.

More than just lamp

LCD FUNCTION: You can press “On/Off button” for 3 seconds to turn on/off the LCD screen light. Includes a digital clock for time, date and temperature display. Set an alarm or time for your desk light. Remove clutter from your office desk!
EYE CARE TECH: Bright and eco-friendly LED lighting with an anti-glare shade. 5 levels of adjustable brightness for clear reading and studying without eye strain.
THREE MODULES: 3 colors temperature available(Warm White/ Natural White/ Cold White) for work(office), reading(studying), relaxation(bedroom) and more.
FOLDABLE DESIGN: LED desk lamp with 180 degree flexible arm and 90 degree base axis. The foldable design saves space and you can carry it anywhere in the office, living room, bedroom, dormitory and any other places.

Read more

Read more

Sleep Mode (Can turn off the blue light)

Intimate design, Long press the power button for 3 seconds to turn on / off the LCD display blue light, so you won’t be disturbed when you sleep at night.

Wireless charging & USB Charging Port

Suitable for Mobile phones with QI Wireless Charging Function.

Charge your mobile devices and keep them with reach.

A Light for All Occasions

From work to study, from reading to rest, this desk lamp provides all the lighting you need.

Read more

Eye-Caring Table Lamp

No flicker, less blue light and no glare lighting can protect your eyes from fatigue and vision

loss during reading drawing, working, etc.

Touch Control & Phone Holder

Light touch dimming, the light color temperature and brightness intensity can be adjusted freely.

Hiding smartphone holder, convenient for prop it up for viewing.

Perfect Gift Box

Perfect for anyone: A gift that everyone would love. Beautifully packaged and gift-ready for any occasion such as birthdays to special holidays.

Read more

With Power Adapter

LARGE DISPLAY — 6.6 inches large LED screen with large numbers make it very easy to read the time. You can also use our led clock as a mirror, its operation is very simple.
DUAL USB PORT — 2 USB charging ports can simultaneously charge two devices. SBackup battery (included) only stores time and alarms’ settings. Tips: This clock can only be used when powered by USB powered.
SNOOZE FUNCTION — Big snooze button helps you to easily turn off the buzzer without opening eyes, and get extra 5-60 minutes sleep. Is your essential artifact.
ADJUSTABLE BRIGHTNESS — The mirror digital clock provides 3-level brightness,adjust by manual or auto to a comfortable brightness. Very convenient to use.
NIGHT MODE — The quiet and silent clock allows you to get rid of the hustle and bustle of the night and fall asleep peacefully. At night the mirror alarm clock will automatically enter the lowest brightness state to prevent affecting your sleep quality.
